alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Star Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 08 at 12:49PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible with total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Higher accumulations near the foothills of the Tetons, around Alpine, and along the east side of Star Valley. South wind could gust 20 to 30 mph. * WHERE...Jackson Hole and Star Valley. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially during the Friday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is uncertainty as to how much snow might accumulate Friday afternoon as temperatures could rise to the mid 30s.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
